channel.title: Purchase Methods OTHER then credit card?
channel.description: Given the fact that Kasperky insists your website is harmful and I'm forced to manually kill it for a minute to even load your homepage, I would prefer not to provide you with sensitive financial details like my credit card. No support for PayPal?

item.title: Purchase Methods OTHER then credit card?
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Um, scam site? The definition of scam is a fraudulent or deceptive act or operation, from many people on the discord who bought keys from paypal can gladly and honestly tell you that they received what they payed for.

Read full topic
item.source: Purchase Methods OTHER then credit card?
